ratings.comment: He is so great! Very caring for his students and grades pretty easily. All quizzes are on canvas and you have multiple attempts, not honorlocked, final is the same. He grades homework the hardest but it is not weighted much at all. Posts videos of all concepts so you can go back and look as your working through quizzes and homework.
If you have a choice to take this lecture, just take it! one of the best classes in UW-Madison!

Professor He is a great marketing professor. Everything about this course is organized and he will post everything you need and requirements prior to the lecture. During the synchronous lecture, he tried to make sure everyone is following up. Just follow his instructions and you get an A!

Cheng is an amazing professor, and his lectures are very clear. He relates most recent real-life news in most lessons. The class is very problem-solving based but he guides you through it well! There's some coding with R and I don't have prior experience but he helps you through it!

One of the best professors in my life! Caring a lot for his student, he always makes sure we understand the lecture before moving to the next slides and even uploads review videos for each module. He teaches us R-programming & Radiant hands by hands. Although there are many assignments and quizzes, the materials are well designed and beneficial.
